item.title: Used Hugo
item.description: I made a website Link to heading And it wasn’t that difficult. Just had to work on this for a few hours. I got my free domain last week. I have a github account and a basic static webpage hosted on Github pages and linked to my custom domain through Cloudflare. Now, I’m going to use Hugo to make it better.
